Belum Berubah, IHSG Masih Merah di Jeda Siang
06 Nov 2019, 05:13 by Fadhly Fauzi Rachman


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) dibuka negatif pagi ini. IHSG masih berada di zona merah hingga jeda siang.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah siang ini berada di level Rp 13.988.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 9,7 poin (0,16%) ke 6.273. Indeks LQ45 juga menguat ke 998.Membuka perdagangan Rabu (6/11/2019), IHSG turun 3,9 poin (0,05%) ke level 6.261. Indeks LQ45 juga turun 2,5 poin (0,25%) poin ke 996.IHSG masih di zona merah pada jeda siang. IHSG turun 28 poin (0,46%) ke 6.235. Indeks LQ45 turun 4 poin (0,43%) ke 995,436.Mengutip Artha Sekuritas, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Bercampur. Dow Jones ditutup 27.492,63 (+0,11%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.434,68 (+0,02%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.074,62 (-0,12%). Bursa saham AS ditutup bercampur, index Dow Jones masih mencatatkan all-time high. Fokus investor saat ini masih pada perjanjian perdagangan antara AS-China yang akan ditandatangani pada November 2019 ini. Pihak AS mengatakan pada fase 1 ini akan menunjukkan komitmen yang lebih pasti untuk mengurangi tarif impor dari China. Namun, investor akan tetap skeptis pada keputusan perdagangan AS-China setelah beberapa kali pihak US mengingkari persetujuan dari beberapa persetujuan sebelumnya. Pasar Asia dibuka menguat terbatas mengikuti perkembangan pasar AS.Bursa Asia pagi ini bergerak di dua arah, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 naik 35 poin ke 23.287
Indeks Hang Seng turun 2 poin ke 27.680
Indeks Shanghai turun 6 poin ke 2.984
Indeks Strait Times menguat 10 poin ke 3.258

Have Not Changed, JCI Still Red at Afternoon Break
Nov 6, 2019, 05:13 by Fadhly Fauzi Rachman


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) opened negative this morning. JCI was still in the red zone until the midday break. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this afternoon was at the level of Rp 13,988. In pre-trade, CSPI rose 9.7 points (0.16%) to 6,273. The LQ45 index also strengthened to 998. Opened trading Wednesday (11/06/2019), the JCI dropped by 3.9 points (0.05%) to the level of 6,261. The LQ45 index also dropped 2.5 points (0.25%) points to 996. JCI was still in the red zone at midday break. JCI dropped 28 points (0.46%) to 6,235. The LQ45 index fell 4 points (0.43%) to 995,436. Citing Artha Sekuritas, the United States (US) exchange closed mixed. Dow Jones closed 27,492.63 (+ 0.11%), NASDAQ closed 8,434.68 (+ 0.02%), S&P 500 closed 3,074.62 (-0.12%). US stock markets closed mixed, the Dow Jones index was still recording an all-time high. The focus of investors is still on the trade agreement between the US-China which will be signed in November 2019. The US said in phase 1 it would show a more certain commitment to reduce import tariffs from China. However, investors will remain skeptical of US-China trade decisions after several times the US reneged on the agreement of several previous agreements. Asian markets opened limited gains following the development of the US market. Asian stocks moved this morning in two directions, following their movements:

The Nikkei 225 index rose 35 points to 23,287
The Hang Seng Index fell 2 points to 27,680
The Shanghai index fell 6 points to 2,984
The Strait Times Index rose 10 points to 3,258
